name: Divine Science News (IAPSOP)
content:
Divine Science News (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Divine Science News Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Divine Science News, The. 1943 Monthly Denver, CO. Publisher: Colorado College of Divine Science. Editor: Alice L. Moore. Succeeds: Fulfillment (1902-1906)-->Divine Science Quarterly (1906-1912)-->Power Magazine (1912?-1915)-->Aspire to Better Living (1916)-->Daily Studies in Divine Science (1916- 1935?)-->Divine Science Weekly (1919-1925)-->First Divine Science Church Weekly Bulletin (1928-1937)-->Divine Science Monthly (1935-1950)-->Aspire (1951-?) Succeeded by: Divine Science Messenger (1976-1983?) 1/1, September 1943. 8 1/2 x 11, 4-8 pp. Free of charge. This was a topical newsletter begun as a companion to The Divine Science Monthly which also was published by Nona L. Brooks' Divine Science College and First Divine Science Church in Denver. The first issue was 4 pp., with a printing of 1, 500, and a year later it had expanded to 8 pp. with a printing of 6,600. It probably began to decline with Brooks' death in March 1945. Denver Public Library. Issues:Divine Science News V1 N1 Sep 1944
